Bertemu di Thailand, Ini Pembicaraan Jokowi dan Presiden FIFA
03 Nov 2019, 02:52 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Presiden Republik Indonesia, Joko Widodo, menunjukkan komitmennya soal penyelenggaraan Piala Dunia U-20 di Indonesia. Jokowi, sapaan karib Joko Widodo, menyebut saat ini pemerintah dan PSSI sudah mulai mempersiapkan helatan akbar tersebut.
"Kami akan bekerja keras menjamin Piala Dunia U-20 di Indonesia berlangsung sukses dan lancar. Kami telah memiliki pengalaman dalam menyelenggarakan Asian Games dan juga Asian Para Games 2018," ujar Jokowi, kala bertemu dengan Presiden FIFA Gianni Infantino di The Boardroom Hotel Grand Hyatt Erawan, Bangkok.
Menurut Jokowi, Indonesia tengah mempersiapkan 10 stadion sebagai venue Piala Dunia U-20. 10 stadion ini tersebar di Sumatra, Jawa, dan Bali. Pemerintah Indonesia pun menyambut baik jika Tim Pendahulu FIFA datang untuk berkoordinasi dengan PSSI.
"Kami gembira jika ada masukan, termasuk standar kelayakan stadion dan lainnya. Pendampingan juga telah dilakukan oleh Dewan Olimpiade Asia (Olympic Council of Asia), saat Asian Games 2018," tutur Jokowi.
FIFA telah secara resmi memilih Indonesia menjadi tuan rumah Piala Dunia U-20 2021 setelah memenangi bidding dalam pengumuman yang berlangsung di Shanghai, China, Kamis (24/10) lalu.
Indonesia berhasil mengalahkan Peru, Brasil, dan tiga negara Timur Tengah yang menjadi tuan rumah bersama: Bahrain, Arab Saudi, dan Uni Emirat Arab, untuk menjadi tuan rumah Piala Dunia U-20 2021.
Apa lagi yang dibicarakan antara Jokowi dan Infantino? Simak di bawah ini.

Meet in Thailand, This is the Talk of Jokowi and FIFA President
Nov 3 2019, 02:52 by Bola.net
Bola.net - The President of the Republic of Indonesia, Joko Widodo, showed his commitment regarding the holding of the U-20 World Cup in Indonesia. Jokowi, the nickname of Joko Widodo, said that currently the government and PSSI have begun to prepare the grand helatan.
"We will work hard to ensure the U-20 World Cup in Indonesia is successful and smooth. We already have experience in organizing the Asian Games and also the 2018 Asian Para Games," Jokowi said, when meeting with FIFA President Gianni Infantino at The Boardroom of the Grand Hyatt Hotel Erawan, Bangkok.
According to Jokowi, Indonesia is preparing 10 stadiums for the U-20 World Cup venue. These 10 stadiums are spread across Sumatra, Java and Bali. The Indonesian government welcomed the FIFA Predecessor Team to coordinate with PSSI.
"We are happy if there is input, including stadium eligibility standards and others. Assistance has also been carried out by the Asian Olympic Council (Olympic Council of Asia), during the 2018 Asian Games," Jokowi said.
FIFA has officially chosen Indonesia to host the 2021 U-20 World Cup after winning the bidding in the announcement which took place in Shanghai, China, last Thursday (10/24).
Indonesia managed to defeat Peru, Brazil, and the three Middle Eastern countries that co-hosted: Bahrain, Saudi Arabia, and the United Arab Emirates, to host the 2021 U-20 World Cup.
